code: import{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import SharedDataContext from'./SharedDataContext';function SpotifySearch(){const{searchTerm}=useContext(SharedDataContext);const[data,setData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(searchTerm){let myRequest=new Request("http://localhost:3001/api/spotify-search?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(searchTerm),"&type=track"));fetch(myRequest).then(response=>{if(!response.ok){throw new Error("HTTP error! Status: ".concat(response.status));}return response.blob();});}},[searchTerm]);}export default SpotifySearch;
